DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate efficacy tolerability combination use Passiflora incarnata L , Crataegus oxyacantha Salix alba L mild moderate anxiety . Clinical study phase III , multicenter , prospective , open . Patients include sufficient quantity achieve minimum number 124 evaluable patient .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Tolerability Study Treat Mild Moderate Anxiety
DOC.criteria: Patients achieve score 18 29 point Hamilton Scale Anxiety ; Individuals ethnic group male female , age 18 year ; Consent subject research ( consent form sign ) . Patients know hypersensitivity component formula ; Pregnant woman nurse mother ; Patients endogenous depression , schizophrenia , suicidal tendency ; Patients heart disease unabated , unabated kidney , liver lung unabated unabated , discretion investigator ; Addiction drug , include alcohol , discretion investigator ; Patients use medication could interfere effect drug study ; Impossibility compliance protocol
